divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter was playing outside in our backyard and came running in saying that she has seen a "flying saucer" hover over our house and slowly move off to the north. It then "reappeared" again over our neighbors house on the South side and moved off slowly to the North again. She stated that it was very close to her and it had multicolored lights.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Owasso
There were no other sightings in Owasso on or around July 14th 2012
